title: 装了NoCheat插件玩家走路一卡一卡
author: AloRyDada
txt_content: 战争服太多飞，搞了个NoCheat插件用用，装了我OP能飞，但今天一堆人举报说走路一卡一卡{:10_524:}在config配置里面修改了moving的survivalfly的active，把true改成了false，还不行，到底要改哪个，求解，高金粒！{:10_496:}

replies.author: AloRyDada
replies.txt_content:
具体是这样的：
survivalfly:
      active: false
      extended:
        vertical-accounting: true
      stepheight: default
      setbackpolicy:
        falldamage: true
        voidtovoid: true
      actions: log:flyshort:3:10:f cancel vl>100 log:flyshort:0:10:if cancel vl>400 log:flylong:0:5:cif cancel vl>1500 log:flylong:0:5:cif cancel cmd:kickfly
      hover:
        active: true
        step: 5
        ticks: 85
        loginticks: 0
        falldamage: true
        sfviolation: 500
    trace:
      size: 60
      mergedist: 0.9752
    vehicles:
      preventdestroyown: true
      enforcelocation: default
    velocity:
      activationcounter: 80
      activationticks: 140
      strictinvalidation: true
    ignorestance: default
    tempkickillegal: true
    loadchunks:
      join: true
    sprintinggrace: 2.0
    assumesprint: true
    speedgrace: 4.0
    enforcelocation: default
